name: OS-72-2 In Obsidian 2
Lore: 'Piloted by Dodson Makraven, wingman of Cive Rashon. Experienced TIE pilot with many kills in atmospheric combat. Nicknamed ''Night Beast'' for his many curfew violations.',
Text: 'Deploy -1 and power +3 at a cloud sector. Permanent pilot is •OS-72-2, who provides ability of 2, adds 2 to power and, at a cloud sector, may draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.',
